data.actual_result: A "50+ New Messages" appears on the top of the screen, even if there has been only 1 deleted message
data.expected_result: Since you have no new messages, well, you do not have a new messages banner
data.short_description: If an x number of messages in deleted in one channel while it is out of focus, the "50+ New Messages" banner appears
data.steps_to_repro: - Go in a channel where messages are deleted frequently (for example <#232568032394870784>) - Make sure a message is deleted while you are focused on a different server - Go to that channel - Obsèrve
